HOME_PAGE.MAIN_DESCRIPTION: MerMer: An experienced blockchain team that specializes in the implementation, consulting, and research and development of WEB 3.0 solutions. We have developed renowned blockchain cold wallets, crypto currency exchange, and the AI big data server project of National Center for High-Performance Computing.
HOME_PAGE.NOTICE_DESCRIPTION:
Beware of fraudulent activities! We want to remind you that MerMer does not provide any form of financial advice, fund investments, or discretionary account operation. We also do not offer custody or management services for cryptocurrencies and trading activities. Furthermore, we also do not draft any investment contracts for our users. If you receive any communications, messages, calls, or invitations through social media platforms to join investment groups that promise high returns and low risks, please immediately contact the Anti-Fraud Hotline at 165 for verification. Do not disclose any financial or personal information to these parties. 
Stay safe from scams.
HOME_PAGE.CATCH_UP_DESCRIPTION: Unlocking the Power of Web 3.0: Redefining Business Models with Transparent, Secure Transactions.
HOME_PAGE.CATCH_UP_BLOCK_1_DESCRIPTION: Decentralized technologies like blockchain and smart contracts ensure your data remains untampered and your privacy intact.
HOME_PAGE.CATCH_UP_BLOCK_2_DESCRIPTION: Web 3.0 Unleashes Innovation Across Finance, Supply Chain, Gaming, and Beyond.
HOME_PAGE.CATCH_UP_BLOCK_3_DESCRIPTION: According to a report by the World Economic Forum, blockchain and related technologies could add over $1.7 trillion to the global economy by 2030.
HOME_PAGE.CATCH_UP_BLOCK_4_DESCRIPTION: Decentralization, Streamlined Processes, Personalized Engagement, New Revenue Models, Global Expansion, and Data Privacy Excellence.
HOME_PAGE.WHAT_WE_OFFER_BLOCK_1_DESCRIPTION: Blockchain System Integration and Implementation Technology Consultant

AUTHOR.JULIAN_INTRO: Give me a cup of Milk Cap Tea and I can lift the whole world. Must be full sugar and Cream Cheese flavor. Preferably topped with a Strawberry Mochi.
AUTHOR.JODIE_INTRO: Has a weird obsession with fluffy things. During meetings, there are always two little minions by her side cheering her on with gusto. If it comes to a fight, they can do nothing but meow.
AUTHOR.EMILY_INTRO: A weight training enthusiast who can effortlessly deadlift seventy kilograms shifted to road cycling and became a carb-loving chubby person. Now, she plans to restructure her training routine to regain the lost muscle mass.
AUTHOR.SHIRLEY_INTRO: “I'm thinking of buying a new monitor, maybe I'll head to MUJI and take a look,” is her train of thought.
AUTHOR.STEVE_INTRO: Due to his excessive drinking, Steve suffers from serious memory impairment. He has a skill for wine tasting, but he often loses track of who he is. The only thing he is sure of is his aversion to sherry.
AUTHOR.YANG_INTRO: “A Ramos Gin Fizz, a touch of blues, and endless facial anxiety. Love dancing in the dance floor, but too lazy to workout.
